now trying your code

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11190 == true) {//by Blckbeast if(playerLevel[3] <= 99) { healing[1] = 40; healing[2] = 40; } }

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11190 == true) {//by Blckbeast if(playerLevel[0] <= 99) { healing[1] = 40; healing[2] = 40; } }

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11190 == true) {//by Blckbeast if(playerLevel[3] <= 99) { healing[0] = 40; } }

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11190 == true) {//by Blckbeast if(playerLevel[0] <= 99) { healing[0] = 40; } }
